name: 有機化學專題討論（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習   允許重複修 ◎課程開放上修
goals: Through the discussion of books and newspapers, students can learn about the latest research developments in related fields, enhance students' research horizons and the ability to read English journals, and train students to organize and express academic research results, comment on opinions, and discuss questions and answers on the spot.
syllabus:
本課程的目標希望藉由書報討論來了解相關領域最新的研究發展，增進學生研究視野及閱讀英文期刊的能力，並訓練學生對於學術性研究成果的整理表達、意見評論、與臨場討論問答。  
  
最近一年內發表於指定SCI化學相關領域期刊的研究論文。

Advanced Organic Synthesis

1\. Fundamentals Revisited:  Structure, Bonding and Reactivity, Stereochemistry

2\. Orbitals & Reactivity, Frontier Orbitals & Chemical Reactions

3\. Pericyclic Reactions and the Condensation of Orbital Symmetry

4\. Aromaticity: The 150-Year Riddle

5\. Physical Organic Chemistry and Reaction Mechanisms

6\. Carbocations & Synthesis Using Carbocations to Form C-C Bonds

7\. Carbanions & Synthetic Reactions of Carbon Nucleophiles: Substitution and Addition 

8\. Free Radicals, Carbenes, Arynes, and Nitrenes

9\. Applications of Free Radical Chemistry in Synthesis
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program)    The course can be retaken ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
